availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Owen Dorsey (Oldham County merchant and prov govt)

body.p: Oldham County, Kentucky, merchant and provisional government convention member. Maryland native.Married to Mildred Caldwell Dorsey in Oldham County, Kentucky, in March 1852. Father of
Member of the convention of the provisional government held at Russellville in November 1861.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Oldham County, p. 876.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ellis County, Precinct of Red Oak, p. 358A.
Tenth Manuscript Census of the United States (1880), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Dallas County, Dallas, p. 45B.
